Key Match Events: The Cleveland Guardians scored five runs in the first inning
Lane Thomas hit a home run in the first inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: The error by Zach McKinstry was initially ruled as an error but was later changed to an RBI double for Jose Ramirez
Others: The Tigers lost Game 1 of the American League Division Series to the Guardians 7-0
The game was played on October 5, 2024
